CustomField.formula: if( (TODAY()- Program_Start__c) > (365), "Power User",if((TODAY()- Program_Start__c) > (180) ,"Average",if((TODAY()- Program_Start__c) < (180) ,"Red Flag","No Data")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Power User - 12+ months Average - 7 - 12 months Red Flag - under 6 months
CustomField.label: Tenure
